amendment.description: To ensure that certain persons do not evade or avoid the prohibitions imposed under the International Emergency Powers Act, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1377 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 202.

action.text: Amendment SA 1377 proposed by Senator Collins.
Amendment SA 1377 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
